synopsis: Kakeru is working to become an idol. One day, the president of his agency has a big announcement, but first his idol group must practice the world's most embarrassing self-introductions! Will the big news be worth the humiliation?

The boys of SHONEN HOLLYWOOD work hard to clean up HOLLYWOOD TOKYO. Kakeru takes his "part-time job" seriously, but feels like he is following the wrong path. The president tries to give him a push, but is it in the right direction?

Mii writes a letter to his personal idol and former SHONEN HOLLYWOOD member, Minoru "Tommy" Tomii. He had no idea when he sent the letter that it would bring a surprise visitor to HOLLYWOOD TOKYO. Will the stories be everything he imagined?

title.jp: People Die. They Die Sooner or Later, But...

synopsis: Kira wants to shine on stage and make the audience happy... or so his mother says. He's never had a chance to decide what he wants for himself. But when his part gets cut to just a few lines, Kira has to take a good look at what compels him to act.

It's time to perform in front of a live audience for the very first time, but are guys ready for it? There is no going back now as the new generation of SHONEN HOLLYWOOD presents the thought-provoking play, "AIR BOYS."

title.jp: A Place to Belong on Rainy Days

synopsis: After forgetting his lines during "AIR BOYS," Makki isn't sure if HOLLYWOOD TOKYO is the right place for him after all. After all, he isn't naturally gifted at acting like Kira. But if this isn't his special place, where does he belong-

title.jp: You Cannot Devote Your Life to Your Life

synopsis: Kakeru starts to feel insecure about his singing voice. He wants to improve, but he isn't sure how. He seeks advice from his school friends to fellow members of SHONEN HOLLYWOOD. Will he be able to improve or is he doomed to sound bad?

The president decides that it is time to hold a summer training camp. Tommy is excited to reenact some of the moments he saw of the previous SHONEN HOLLYWOOD's summer camp. Can he make the magic happen again?

The president is putting SHONEN HOLLYWOOD's face out on TV, but not in the way that the boys had expected. Instead of cool music programs, they go on "lame" TV programs. The humiliation is eating at Shun. If he's given the chance to go, will he?

SHONEN HOLLWOOD has been invited to perform on Sensational Music Room along with four other singers. Each guest is given a chance to sing and dance on TV. One of the guests is a familiar face... Who could it be?

The Christmas Eve concert is less than a month away, but morale is at an all-time low for SHONEN HOLLYWOOD. The group has discovered that tickets aren't selling. Each of the members must decide how he wants to cope with being an "unwanted" idol.

The guys are trying to work out the last few kinks in their performance before the Christmas Eve concert, but their strained relationships are affecting their dancing. Is there any way for them to finally come together as a group?

title.jp: For All Eternity, We can be Reborn

synopsis: The final preparations are underway as SHONEN HOLLYWOOD enters the last week before their Christmas Eve concert. Are their bonds strong enough to carry them through to the end, or will someone get last minute stage fright?
